attributes.action: T.R.I.P. the way out of the C.A.G.E.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With Totally Real Intellectual Property we need to escape from the Criminally Antisocial Gambling Establishment.
Currently the philosophy of value is based on psychology - game theory at best. This is more appropriately connected more ego neutral philosophies such as those of physics.
The abstract forms of objects of value may be evaluated in terms of the networks of attention (in terms of time and compound qualities) and energy (of formation and distribution) as fundamentally related, linked, measurable quantifications found in physics. The networks are based in the mathematics of graph theory.
This would allow a rational market to emerge free from the positive feedback herd psychology aspects found under current regimes.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
